page.title: 12SHOPS
page.content: The past twenty years has seen the {rapid decline}of the{small village} {general store.}In the entire survey area there are{only eight shops}to be found and only five of those are food shops.The villages of E. and W. Ashling now have no immediate shops whilst Fishbourne has only one.The only{Post Office}is at Bosham. Bakery,butcher,sweet and general store shops have all{closed in recent} {years. } A large{Hypermarket at Havant}and numerous{supermarkets at Chichester } have taken their toll.Shopping habits have changed.Families travel by car or bus to the large shops..buying for the week if not the month. { Door to door salesmen}do bring milk,bread,vegetables and general provisions to most areas.
